messages.title: Your Choice on 8th June
messages.content: Liberal Democrat MPs fighting to stop hard Brexit wrecking Britain. OR A Labour party that voted with UKIP to back an extreme Brexit. The Conservatives are out of the race in Cambridge. Voting Conservative here helps Labour.

issues.brexitEurope: Liberal Democrat MPs fighting to stop hard Brexit wrecking Britain. A Labour party that voted with UKIP to back an extreme Brexit.

community.content: A vote for Julian is a vote for local champions and real improvements for our city.

endorsements.endorsement: "I've voted Labour all my life, but Brexit was a game-changer for me. Julian is a strong pro-European and he's getting my support this year."
